title: My league will not open
body: Hi everyone, i have a very annoying problem that i don't know how to fix. when i try and open league of legends the icon comes up but then every single time it says "PVP.net pathcher Kernel has stopped working". does anyone know how to fix this?? Please help

replies.body: Your patcher needs permissions from your OS to launch and scan files, otherwise it may result in this error.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to reconfigure your settings.  That should get you back in!
